channel.title: [PI] Webclient Loading Please wait [PI] It shows chatbar rep++
channel.description:
hey ppl
i made a webclient
and when i use it, it downloads cache and shows background, then i can log in and shows me chat area and inventory..
but the playing screen keeps black and says loading please wait ( could also be that it freezes)
how can this come ( happens to with my client now)
maybe its the map data ??? wrong in cache or such
plz tell me rep++
( to see what i mean go to [url=http://www.nightmarexwebclient.webs.com/webclient.htm]www.nightmarexwebclient.webs.com/webclient.htm[/url]) [b]dont worry this is [u]NOT[/u] advertising, its a[u] test[/u] site with a[u] test[/u] webclient[/b]
[img]http://i22.servimg.com/u/f22/16/52/06/54/webcli10.png[/img]
